content.raw:
Carlos,

The stationkeeping and wayfinding tasks seem to be working as expected. At least, I’m seeing reasonable values printed to the topics. In both, launching places me near the post along the shore as expected. Also, I no longer see any course elements, but this is also what I expect--just mentioning it to confirm.

One thing that is a little odd is a floating green antenna in the global view. This shows up in both tasks--see the screenshot. At first I thought maybe it representing the stationkeeping goal but that is not the case. Is this an intentional feature of the course?

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/4229105847-Screenshot_from_2019-05-01_12-38-01.png)
‌

\(Edit: I can see it in Brian’s view too so maybe it is not a concern.\)

Best,

Michael

Carlos,

The stationkeeping and wayfinding tasks seem to be working as expected. At least, I’m seeing reasonable values printed to the topics. In both, launching places me near the post along the shore as expected. Also, I no longer see any course elements, but this is also what I expect--just mentioning it to confirm.

One thing that is a little odd is a floating green antenna in the global view. This shows up in both tasks--see the screenshot. At first I thought maybe it representing the stationkeeping goal but that is not the case. Is this an intentional feature of the course?
